title: 【#５】　都市伝説解体センター　「罪人の影」　【白上フブキ/ホロライブ】
name: Shirakami Fubuki

entries.text: I figured I should do this at least once today.
Since I did the Fox Tribe voice three times last time
and got pointed out for it.
Once in a while, I should use this voice...
I use this quite a bit for external voice recording work.
"This is Shirakami Fubuki, the number one voice in your heart."
"We are currently holding a collaboration with Hololive!" I do that kind of stuff often.
I usually keep that idol switch turned off,
so I don't speak like this very often.
I'll go with my professional "going out" voice for now.
"I definitely hear this at Lawson often."
I do it quite a lot.
I guess I have no choice but to do it occasionally on stream too.
Please wait, and have high hopes.
Now then, Urban Legend Dismantling Center.
it was a "curse someone and dig two graves" kind of vibe.
Make sure you don't go around cursing people, everyone.
Let's try not to live while cursing others, was the lesson.
But he really was the King of Scum, truly.
I won't go as far as to say he deserved it entirely,
but he certainly got his just deserts.
It was karmic retribution. Complete karmic retribution.
And then, Jasmine-paisen turned out to be...
Shockingly, police. She was police after all.
I thought she might be an informant or from another organization,
but turns out she's police. And a Superintendent, was it?
She's investigating Saitodane... or rather, Sabijima.
And apparently, she's investigating the Urban Legend Dismantling Center's
She's a Superintendent. A total elite.
And the person riding in the car with her... car?
The person riding in the car...
There's a hypothesis that it's not Yuma-san.
I'd like to ask for Yuma-san's name.
Also, did Yamada really disappear or what?
and, well, he was in a pretty
I wonder if Yamada will never show up again after that?
I wonder what the truth is.
I want to call Yuma-san by their actual character name already,
but no info is coming out at all.
Apparently, there are 6 episodes in total?
The Book of Prophecy, Illumina Cards.
I forgot what voice I used for the Center Director.
"These have been left at every crime scene so far."
I feel like it was something like this.
"The first was Eiko-san, the second was Kinoko-san."
Ah, Kinoko too... Ah, that's right! That's bad!
You really... wait, were they killed? Gas Mask.
"And the fourth was in the cursed box recovered from Mayusaki-san..."
"Rumor has it that not just Gas Mask-san, but all of them are missing."
"If true, these really are cards that invite misfortune, just as reputed."
The patterns around the box, or something?
"It seems the time has come to think about..."
"The meaning and connection of these cards."
I got a little happy there.
"I haven't been able to organize the information..."
"I got from the closet yet, but..."
"Then, that child holding the 'Collapse and Judgment' card..."
"Do you consider her part of that connection?"
Could it be... Azami will disappear too?
"Eh, the motifs drawn on 'Collapse and Judgment'?"
Yeah, "I'm watching you," like a lolicon.
"The angel monument at the phone pole incident scene."
"The same thing was on Gas Mask-san's card."
"There were also stairs, locks, chains, keys, and peering eyes."
"Chains for the eyes peering from the dark."
"A key for the death approaching from the mirror image."
"Among the motifs drawn on 'Collapse and Judgment'..."
"The only one left is the other key."
"The Illumina Card with that key drawn on it..."
"Will probably be obtained in this investigation request."
"So a request has come in after all?"
"This request is from the president of an IT company."
"The request is about a precious item."
"He wants us to retrieve it if possible."
"Perhaps we can get closer to the truth."
"Now that the prophecies of the Illumina Cards are converging..."
"If something were to happen to you and your partner, that girl..."
"You and your partner, that girl"? Who?
Oh, Azami? That's what she means.
"You don't need to worry so much."
Is Tomiiri really the correct reading?
Eh, so they were a police officer after all.
They're way too suspicious for a police officer.
"This month, there are many international conferences and memorial ceremonies."
"We expect an increase in VIPs visiting from around the world."
"Director General Kurosawa of the MPD Security Bureau regarding the rumored terrorism..."
"Announced that they will maintain strict security measures."
"Jasmine-san, isn't this request a bit strange?"
"Before was weird too, but this isn't that kind of case, right?"
"You mean, why don't they report it to the police?"
"If they know something was stolen, the police would listen properly."
"It's more certain than us investigating." Indeed.
"In other words, there must be something else going on."
"Is this president doing something shady or bad?"
"Well then, can you look into the reputation and rumors around there?"
"Understood. I will begin the SNS investigation."
Wait, is it Azami's birthday today?
I feel like I saw some
"Ah, no. I just happened to see something recently."
"A request from such a big president."
"Makes you a bit cautious, doesn't it?"
"I wonder if he's on the top floor of a skyscraper."
People who can live on the top floor of a skyscraper are amazing.
"It wouldn't hurt to check for rumors of shady business or bad reputation."
"U-Tech supports a secure Japanese IT environment."
"U-Tech late March announcement. Huge profit increase. Year-on-year +51%."
"Since I can't convey how amazing it is, I'll just say:"
"HQ is in a high-rise office building in Toranomon."
"I don't really get it, but seems amazing."
"This company is strong because they work with government agencies and major corporations."
"Oh, clients are government and big corps? Amazing."
"People imagine they rake in cash easily, but probably not."
"Since it's national information, it must be pretty hard."
"The person in charge must have insane stress."
"Make a mistake and you're definitely fired."
Ah, that's the urban legend where if you post that word on SNS,
you get a reply from the dead or something.
"It's not about getting a reply from the dead..."
"Engineers can't do anything about it, right?"
"Kaiba! If you lose this duel, I'm taking you to Ichiran!"
"Win or lose, I'm taking you to Ichiran!"
"I think I have the search words now."
If you had 70 billion, what would you buy?
"The kind where you don't have to work anymore."
"With 70 billion, how many times can you redo life?"
Isn't 70 billion impossible to spend in one lifetime?
How many times can you reincarnate?
"People who were wild in their youth..."
"He's a super rich kid (bonbon) because his family is powerful."
Can you go to space for 700 yen?
"If he's a gambler, he could melt it."
Even for a gambler, melting 70 billion in a day is absurd, isn't it?
Is it a 1 to 100 million game?
"If your parents are rich, you succeed at anything."
"It's nice for guys whose parents pulled an SSR."
the rails are often already laid out for them,
so I arbitrarily imagine they feel suffocated.
I'm sure things are tough in their own way.
"Because the parents are wealthy, the child became wealthy, basically."
"He was wearing big sunglasses and had a great aura, I thought he was a celebrity."
"Looked super cool, my opinion of him went up."
"I saw him last week too, but..."
"He had zero aura, totally plain, thought he was a regular guy."
"Thought about saying hi but got glared at."
Something's different between here and there.
"Have to distinguish between plain mode and private mode."
"From leader of a popular streamer group to IT President."
"For such a big president to make a request to us,"
"So far, only rumors about spotting a celebrity in town."
"I guess we have to ask the man himself."
Does this mean society lets you become a 70 billion yen president?
I'm fine being a 700 yen president.
70 billion is too much of a dream.
"Jasmine-san, isn't this really a super skyscraper?"
"No mistake. The President is on the top floor."
"Just tell the receptionist you have an appointment and it'll be fine."
"Right, right. Also, don't get unnecessarily nervous."
It feels like something terrible is about to happen in Tir na nÓg.
"We have many appointments for the President today..."
"Ah, from the Urban Legend Dismantling Center."
Oh, a nice older sister with glasses.
"I am Kurosawa Yuya, representative of Skillar... U-Tech Priority."
"so I haven't remembered her name yet."
You don't say it often, after all.
"You wanted us to retrieve a stolen item?"
"Excuse me, does Kiyomoto-san not know about this incident?"
"However, there is no mistake that an intruder appeared."
"I am the only one who realized it."
"If there really was an intruder, shouldn't you report it to the police?"
"so we want to avoid making a big scene if possible."
"Also, I want you to view the situation objectively."
"That's how strange the event two days ago was."
"I heard you specialize in such investigations."
"If it's strange, then perhaps we do."
"I'm having the security footage from that time analyzed,"
"but that will take a little more time."
"First, if you listen to me and my secretary, you'll understand the strangeness."
"I'll grasp what happened two days ago with 'Nenshi' (Spirit Vision)."
Ah, I'm totally getting brushed off here.
"You might want to be careful with this investigation."
"Can't share details, didn't report to police."
"Kurosawa-san himself is the strange one at this point."
Well, let's go to the secretary-san.
"Excuse me, I'd like to ask you something."
"Yes, I am Kiyomoto, the President's secretary."
"The President told me to testify truthfully about what I saw."
"Please ask anything related to the investigation."
"I'd like to ask about two days ago."
"Even if you ask what happened two days ago, nothing in particular..."
"The President asked too, but I have no idea what's what."
"I see. Can you just tell me the story anyway?"
The story of two days ago.
"Two days ago, the President said he was going to a client, so I saw him off."
"I greeted the President upon his return."
"After that, it was just business as usual,"
"That must be the one Kurosawa-san mentioned."
"But the intruder still got in, right?"
"Try asking the secretary thoroughly about two days ago."
Ah, just to confirm about two days ago.
"Even if you ask Kurosawa-san about two days ago..."
"First, all I can say is that something precious was stolen."
"I'll speak after you hear from the secretary."
"Even if he says that, Kiyomoto-san seems to know nothing."
"I wonder if investigating traces around here will create a conversational opening."
"But it could be the intruder, right?"
"Seems to be touching the desk drawer."
"Eh, feels like this shadow is looking at me."
"This shadow is rummaging through the drawer."
"It's holding something, but I can't tell what."
It's definitely holding something in its left hand.
"Does this mean this case was prophesied too?"
"Does that have something to do with your current investigation?"
"In that case, please return it to its original position and continue your investigation."
"The shadow was definitely taking something from the drawer."
"I wonder if something is missing from this drawer."
"Was anything stolen from the top drawer of the desk?"
"I have a strange ability called 'Spirit Vision'."
"Even if I say that, you probably won't believe me."
"Seems like it would be very useful for this case."
"I will confirm regarding the stolen item from the drawer."
"Could you ask the secretary as well?"
Why make us run back and forth?
The secretary doesn't know anything, right?
"Did Kurosawa-san take anything from the President's office two days ago?"
"Come to think of it, he left holding something like a red card."
Eh, does she mean an Illumina Card?
"No, it was something completely different, so I wouldn't mistake it."
"I don't know exactly what it was,"
"but I remember because the President seemed to treat it with such importance."
"If something is actually missing, then there really was an intruder."
"This might be a weird question, but..."
"Was there anything strange about the President two days ago?"
"I don't think there was anything strange."
"No, nothing in particular. I greeted him, and he gave a slight bow."
"Also, this might sound weird, but there was one odd thing."
"I mentioned earlier that he left holding something red."
"Strictly speaking, just as I thought he took out that red something,"
"Is it not possible he left while you looked away?"
"I thought he opened the office door,"
"but the next instant, he was gone."
"The Kurosawa that doesn't speak... or rather, the vanishing Kurosawa."
Something shaped like a red card.
"Kurosawa-san, apparently you took something from the top drawer two days ago."
"Two days ago, I did not return to this room from the client's."
"Therefore, it is impossible that I took anything out."
"What impression did you get from her?"
"Did you think she was telling the truth?"
"This is the strange thing I wanted to tell you."
"After taking that 'something' from the desk, she said he suddenly disappeared."
"Since she went out of her way to mention it, I don't think she just missed seeing him."
Doppelganger. The thing that kills you if you see it.
"Honestly speaking, I don't think that story is credible."
"I'm sorry, but could you please verify with the secretary one more time?"
"I'll confirm with Kiyomoto-san one more time."
Ah, shall we contact the police? Just in case.
"If something was actually stolen, the police should listen."
"What will you do? Contact the police..."
"It concerns our company's credibility, so it's critical."
"I want you to proceed with the investigation cautiously."
I feel like I'm being made to run around in circles.
"Yes, Kurosawa-san had something stolen. What was it?"
"But won't he tell us what that 'something' is?"
Kurosawa Yuya is the former leader of a popular streamer group.
"You were in this room with the President, right?"
"Yes, well, it was only for about an hour."
"If it's a Black History Notebook, it would be top secret."
A red Black History Notebook is pretty intense.
It's red, but it's black history.
If it's a Black History Notebook, it is top secret.
If Shirakami's Black History Notebook was stolen,
it would be a top-secret emergency.
Like things written during his popular streamer days.
Like a joke book from when he was streaming.
There might be a notebook with project ideas.
Clothes, hairstyles, or even his face.
"And he took a red card-shaped thing from the drawer and left, correct?"
"Kurosawa-san says he didn't take that red something."
"He wasn't even here in the first place."
"Was that the precious item the President mentioned?"
"Even if you say that, he took it out of the desk right in front of my eyes."
like doing a black history card battle with Marine.
One year ago is recent, right? Recent.
Is it a company with high turnover?
"The person she greeted thinking it was the President..."
"I asked secretary Kiyomoto-san as Kurosawa-san instructed,"
"but two days ago seemed like a normal day with no changes."
"But actually, Kurosawa-san didn't come to the office, yet something is missing."
"Is it just a mistake? Or just forgetting his own actions?"
"there's no doubt an intruder was here."
"Why do their stories contradict so much?"
"Rather than saying this or that from a single word..."
"The intruder disguised himself to look like Kurosawa-san."
"And he only bowed, so she didn't hear his voice."
"Maybe the intruder disguised himself to look like Kurosawa-san."
"Kiyomoto-san's testimony about the missing item wasn't wrong."
"Someone who looked like Kurosawa-san was definitely here."
"But does that mean he resembled him enough to be mistaken?"
"Need to investigate the intruder a bit more."
"A method to confirm if it was the President."
"What is the red card-shaped thing anyway?"
"If it's in this drawer, we'd find it immediately."
"There's a machine attached to the door."
"but entering this room seems difficult too."
"Ah, possibly the security here is super tight too."
"Is a key necessary to enter this room?"
"However, since there is important information from other companies,"
"I am also forbidden from entering this room while the President is away."
"Azami, you're starting to look like a real investigator."
"First, we have to find out what happened around Kurosawa."
"Strange things. He wants us to look at them objectively."
"Secretary Kiyomoto-san seems confused about two days ago,"
"but we should listen to the story, right?"
"Does he want to find fault with the secretary?"
"Well, first we need to find out what the strange thing is."
"From listening to the story, there are no problems so far, or rather..."
"Ah, but a red card-like object went missing."
"I see. Then all that's left is..."
"To find evidence that someone was in this room two days ago."
"It's not just dropped on the floor."
"Come to think of it, Kurosawa-san said he was having the CCTV footage analyzed."
"About the security camera installed over there."
"The General Affairs department, which manages the cameras,"
"Um, how does this look to you, Kiyomoto-san?"
"It looks like nothing other than the President."
"Eh, this is as hard as the Saizeriya Spot the Difference puzzle."
"It resembles me so much that being mistaken is unavoidable."
"Actually, maybe you forgot you returned to this room two days ago?"
"That's impossible. People from the client company can prove it."
"And something is actually missing from this room too."
"But this looks exactly like you, Kurosawa-san."
"Ah, true. Does the camera version have a slight mole?"
"Under the left eye from our perspective..."
"I thought it was a wrinkle, but..."
"I think the on-site investigation is done for now."
"He won't tell me details about what was stolen,"
"and he was oddly impressed by my Spirit Vision."
"and when I used Spirit Vision in the office, the shadow seemed different."
"Also, there was an Illumina Card. Kurosawa-san had it."
"I'm looking forward to the investigation report."
"Find the precious item and retrieve it."
"Considering the request, this case is quite strange for us to handle."
"Indeed. It was content that only we could handle."
"At first I thought it was just theft,"
"but there was an Illumina Card too."
"We can't leave this case just being 'strange'."
"First, let's organize the events that occurred."
"he asked us to listen to his secretary, Kiyomoto-san, right?"
"So we heard about two days ago from Kiyomoto-san."
"What was the strange story you heard from Kiyomoto-san?"
"Security was there... Why was Kurosawa-san there?"
"The fact that Kurosawa-san was there when he shouldn't have been."
"They were in the same room for a while,"
"yet she didn't think it was strange."
"The intruder entered the office as if he were the person himself and behaved naturally."
"So naturally that anyone would suspect their own memory."
"Now, regarding this Fake Kurosawa who came to the office acting like the real Kurosawa Yuya."
"The only witness is the secretary, Kiyomoto-san."
"Her testimony contained an important characteristic of this entity."
"Between the Fake Kurosawa appearing and leaving..."
"What kind of contact did Kiyomoto-san and the Fake Kurosawa have?"
"Not really a greeting, just a slight bow."
"I think he gave a slight bow but they didn't converse."
"She said she felt no unease because he's usually like that."
"Kiyomoto-san did not converse with the Fake Kurosawa."
"If they had exchanged even a single word, the story might have changed."
"Did Kiyomoto-san not realize Kurosawa-san had arrived?"
"Eh, no. She noticed and said she greeted him."
"Right. Furthermore, they were in the same room for about an hour."
"Kiyomoto-san believed without doubt that the Fake Kurosawa was the real one."
"However, the client can prove Kurosawa-san wasn't there."
"The fake Kurosawa that appeared in the office... what kind of existence do you think it is?"
"An existence almost identical to the President. Transformed into the President."
"I am Kurosawa Fubuki with 70 billion in assets."
"I'd be troubled if I got it though."
"A 'what' that has an identical appearance and substance."
"Something with a tangible body that looks exactly alike."
"Wasn't it something like a clone or copy?"
"However, we can prove the person himself was elsewhere."
"It's as if there is another version of him."
"But the figure on the security camera..."
"Is as if there is another version of him."
"The urban legend conceivable from this situation."
"But there's that saying about having 2 or 3 lookalikes in the world."
"Only the person themselves can distinguish it."
"The terrifying part of this anomaly is that if the original meets it, they die."
"Is a Doppelganger such a terrifying urban legend?"
"Right, right. I received an additional request from Kurosawa-san."
"I might be out of touch for a while,"
"but don't worry. Please continue the on-site investigation."
"You say you'll be out of touch for a while..."
"Will we be okay from here on?"
"The phone just won't connect, so it's not much different from usual."
"Not being able to rely on you in a pinch is a bit..."
Did he meet it? Did he meet it?!
"It was smiling. Wondering what it was laughing at with that mouth."
"The mouth was smiling. A lovely smile."
"Today's investigation is at President Kurosawa's home."
"When he called, he was quite excited."
"Saying, 'It appeared! It was in my room! It ran away!'"
"Well, the contact came from the person himself, so he's probably fine for now."
"Eeh, this is going to be one of those 'which is the real one' situations."
"Let's avoid mentioning the Doppelganger death theory in front of him for now."
"He called, so I think he's safe for now, but..."
"No, I haven't heard anything since then."
"It won't end up with 'I leave the dismantling to you', right?"
"We plan to chase rumors about Doppelgangers now..."
"Azami, you're growing fast as an investigator."
"They've been causing various incidents and making noise lately."
"But do Kurosawa-san and Zima have a connection?"
"Didn't you know? Kurosawa is incredibly hated by Zima members."
"Well, likes and dislikes don't matter much,"
"but it seems the anti-Kurosawa movement is getting flashy."
"Understood. I'll chase rumors about the Doppelganger and Kurosawa-san's antis."
"Achieving listing in just 3 years is unthinkable at that age."
"It's because he comes from a good family."
"Since he talks about hard work and struggle stories,"
"he's seen as a naive rich kid (bonbon)."
"If he has a good family and money, isn't it fine to use it?"
"What loop of life is he on?"
"I wonder what life loop the President is on."
"Don't you think? Like he's doing a 'Brush Up Life'."
"If you get serious, it might be quick."
"The Kurosawa-san we see might actually be a Doppelganger legend."
"He stands out way too much though."
"Ah, he's properly the real Kurosawa-san, right?"
"As an urban legend, there are many 'I saw one' testimonies about Doppelgangers."
Do you guys have any Doppel experience stories?
"Lots of curious people. Look into it."
"Even if told 'I saw you walking arm in arm'..."
"Maybe my Doppelganger got a girlfriend before me?"
"I was told by several people 'there was a guy just like you'."
"It is said to be a hallucination where one sees their own figure."
"Information about Doppelgangers likely comes from here."
"there are theories like 'future self' or 'living spirit'."
"they were overseas during that time, so we couldn't have met."
"or only appears in places connected to the original."
"That's why it was just a slight bow."
"Not really his parent's home, but his house."
"I saw myself when I was young at my rural home,"
"Don't you often hear stories like 'I went home and my Doppelganger was already there'? Super scary."
"Many historical figures met their Doppelgangers too."
"If you meet a Doppel, you die, right?"
"Why do they say you die if you meet a Doppelganger?"
"Not that you die because you saw it,"
"but people close to death might see their own illusion."
"People who will die soon see it."
"Written as Shinigami (Death God), read as Doppelganger."
"Even if it's not the original person,"
"seeing someone else's Doppelganger is bad too."
"I want you to search for these rumors too."
"I thought you died from shock if you saw your Doppelganger."
"But you die if you see someone else's too?"
"True, it's not like a shock scene of 'Whoa, it's me!'"
"The soul or astral body leaving the flesh is the Doppelganger,"
"so seeing it means the flesh has no soul,"
"so they will die eventually. I heard something like that."
"Can't dismiss the theory that people who saw it and died had brain tumors."
"I see. The brain tumor causes the brain to show an illusion of oneself."
"There's also a story that the Doppelganger kills the original to switch places."
"Thinking about it, aren't 'Rubber Humans' close to Doppelgangers too?"
"Getting disposed of because you're in the way of magic, replaced by a Rubber Human."
"Can you track what kind of rumors this community is spreading?"
"According to the Doppelganger = Time Slip theory,"
"meeting causes a paradox and they die."
"You can't exist in the same spacetime, so you die from the paradox."
"World Simulator Hypothesis: Doppelganger is a bug. Interacting crashes and kills you."
"The story about dying if you meet a Doppelganger..."
"It's interesting that the muddy theories have plausible reasons."
"In the end, no one actually saw them die."
"I can only assume the guy spreading death rumors is plotting something."
"I wonder how many people today are fakes who took over."
"Well, shall we go to the Prophet?"
"Does that mean they expect a happy event?"
"It seemed like simple content saying 'Geeks will have their day eventually'."
"If you think food will be thrown in just by waiting with your mouth open,"
"The courage to take a step forward."
"Because that step will change society and the world."
"but thinking about how the impression changes by reader..."
"Makes me a bit scared to read it."
"Maybe Kisaragi Tsutomu's words have strange persuasive power."
"Idiots immediately make toys out of words and swing them around."
"It implies the collapse of values that occurs immediately after."
"Causing that collapse is what Kisaragi Tsutomu tried to achieve."
"Ah, maybe the writing left the answer or mindset up to the reader."
"I feel like it was just 'I, Kisaragi Tsutomu, think this way'."
"Depending on the reader, the hope gained was immense."
"Ah, I see. It's that kind of thing."
"Kisaragi holds immense influence over those who can empathize."
"he wrote about his experience being bashed conveniently."
"Hajimara-san from the Occult Tour said something similar."
"Ah, that's because while Kisaragi Tsutomu was an assistant professor,"
"so he was treated as a geek."
"Since it's stimulating, when people want easy superiority,"
"they focus only on that. It's a bad human habit."
"Hey, bad info stands out more, right?"
"Since it's stimulating, when people want easy superiority,"
"they focus only on that. It's a bad human habit."
"GR will destroy the society built by short-sighted, foolish people."
"How should I put it... the people saying GR..."
"Are they trying to achieve something on Kisaragi Tsutomu's behalf?"
"To me, it looks like they're shouting with borrowed authority"
"Like a fox borrowing the tiger's might."
"We strayed a bit from the investigation target."
"Before I knew it, we were on Kisaragi Tsutomu info."
"When investigating Zima, Kisaragi-san's name comes up often."
"How about the Doppelganger info? Did you mark it?"
"Ah, ah, yes! Lots of crazy stuff on Doppelgangers too."
"Hmm. We're almost at President Kurosawa's home."
"Well, the Doppelganger appeared in the office, but the secretary was safe."
"There were various theories in the Doppelganger info,"
"so I don't think it means certain death."
"He's here. He showed up right away."
"It had terrifying eyes, but looked just like me."
"Eh, wait, this is scary. What if they switched places?"
"But it was just for an instant. Before I knew it, he quickly left the house."
"Making a fuss over this would hurt the company's credibility."
"Anyway, can you investigate what he was doing in this house?"
"We have a housekeeper, and she saw it too,"
"so you should be able to hear from her as well."
"Bringing two women home in the middle of the day, what does this mean?"
"This is work, so please be quiet for a bit."
"Actually, she apparently received contact from me that I have no memory of."
"He asked various things about my room."
"I want you to investigate that exchange too."
"Anyway, please take care of the investigation."
"Jasmine-san, what do you think of this case?"
"I think we should carefully observe Kurosawa's behavior."
"He's been an elite since he was a student."
"He has a 1 Million Gold Shield too."
"I'm from the Dismantling Center, may I ask a few questions?"
"Ah, yes. I heard from the Master."
"Anything I know, feel free to ask."
"I am Honda, the housekeeper of this home."

"It was around 8 PM yesterday, I suppose."
"The Master returned and went straight to his room."
"While preparing dinner, I heard the front door open again."
"I peeked and saw the Master standing there."
"I think I involuntarily said 'Didn't you just return?'."
"Immediately after, the Master came out of his room."
"Another Master came out of the room."
"By that time, the Master who came out first..."
"Eh? Does this mean it's a genuine Doppelganger?"

"Do you know the state of Kurosawa-san's room?"
"I clean everywhere except the Master's room."

"When I started working here as a housekeeper,"
"I was told absolutely never to enter there."
"Honda-san, since when have you been a housekeeper at Kurosawa-san's house?"
"Seems like you've been doing it a long time."
"I've done housekeeping for a long time,"
"The secretary is new, and the housekeeper is new."

"and the Master hears, I wonder if I'll be fired."
"Just to confirm, did you speak to the first Kurosawa-san who returned?"

"Ah, just a slight bow here too."

"Something is written on the trophy Kurosawa-san is holding."
"Excuse me, do you have a moment?"
"Um, I might be able to help you."

"Right now, strange things are happening around Kurosawa-san."
"Someone exactly like Kurosawa-san seems to be doing bad things."
"If you're saying that seriously, it's kinda laughable."

"Can I have your name? Can I ask your name?"
"Like, calling women to his house makes no sense."
"and a huge fight broke out. I haven't forgiven him yet."

"but the one who contacted you was likely the Doppelganger."

"Did you speak directly on the phone?"

"'Aika, about when you came to my room...'"

"By the way, what did he ask?"
